meanings.definition: To form or make into a group of twelve.
meanings.sent1: She dozened the cupcakes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The eggs were dozened neatly in the carton.
meanings.sent3: The baker dozened the cookies with precision.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seemed to be dozened by nature.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden were dozened in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To be grouped or arranged in sets of twelve.
meanings.sent1: The cookies dozened on the plate beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The students dozened themselves into groups for the project.
meanings.sent3: The toys in the store were dozened in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The birds dozened on the wire, creating a symmetrical pattern.
meanings.sent5: The books on the shelf were dozened by size for easy access.
